text: Vasaloppet Japan is a cross-country skiing event held around Asahikawa on the island of Hokkaid≈ç in the northern parts of Japan. The event has been held since 1981. The event is named after Vasaloppet in Sweden. == References == ==Other websites== *official website Category:Skiing Category:Sport in Japan Category:1981 establishments in Japan Category:Hokkaido Prefecture
title: Vasaloppet Japan
